Package database_access

Class CustomersAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • database_access.CustomersAccess
  • public class CustomersAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to interact with the customers table in the MySQL database. It provides other classes and methods access to the Customer objects stored locally in the customerList ObservableList. It can add, update and delete customer objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CustomersAccess()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void addCustomer​(int divisionID, java.lang.String postal, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String phone)
      Takes in input from the Add Customer form, turns it into a INSERT SQL statement, and adds it to the customers table in the mySQL database.
      static void deleteCustomer​(CustomersObj customer)
      Uses a DELETE SQL call to delete selected object from the customers table in the MySQL database by customer ID.
      static void findCustomer​(int id)
      Finds the Contact object by the contact ID from the Customer Tableview on the home page.
      static void getAllCustomers()
      Uses a SELECT SQL call to retrieve all objects from the customers table in the MySQL database and adds them to an ObservableList.
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<CustomersObj> getCustomerlist()
      Returns a copy of the ObservableList "customerList" so that it can be viewed in the UI and modified using CRUD techniques.
      static CustomersObj getCustomersObj()
      Retrieves a copy of the customer object stored in this class.
      static void setCustomersObj​(CustomersObj customersObj)
      Used to create a temporary static placeholder of a customer object that is selected to be or was modified.
      static void updateCustomer​(int customerID, int divisionID, java.lang.String postal, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String phone)
      Updates the selected Customer in the database.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public CustomersAccess()

    • Method Detail

      • getAllCustomers

        public static void getAllCustomers()
        Uses a SELECT SQL call to retrieve all objects from the customers table in the MySQL database and adds them to an ObservableList.

      • getCustomerlist

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<CustomersObj> getCustomerlist()
        Returns a copy of the ObservableList "customerList" so that it can be viewed in the UI and modified using CRUD techniques.
        Returns:
        a copy of the ObservableList

      • addCustomer

        public static void addCustomer​(int divisionID,
                               java.lang.String postal,
                               java.lang.String address,
                               java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String phone)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Takes in input from the Add Customer form, turns it into a INSERT SQL statement, and adds it to the customers table in the mySQL database.
        Parameters:
        divisionID - the first level division ID
        postal - the postal code of the customer
        address - the address of the customer
        name - the name of the customer
        phone - the phone number of the customer
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - prevents app from crashing when incorrect SQL syntax is used

      • updateCustomer

        public static void updateCustomer​(int customerID,
                                  int divisionID,
                                  java.lang.String postal,
                                  java.lang.String address,
                                  java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String phone)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Updates the selected Customer in the database.
        Parameters:
        customerID - the customer's ID
        divisionID - the first level division ID
        postal - the postal code of the customer
        address - the address of the customer
        name - the name of the customer
        phone - the phone number of the customer
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - prevents app from crashing when incorrect SQL syntax is used

      • setCustomersObj

        public static void setCustomersObj​(CustomersObj customersObj)
        Used to create a temporary static placeholder of a customer object that is selected to be or was modified. Used in the HomeController class method - onUpdateCus.
        Parameters:
        customersObj - the selected customer object

      • getCustomersObj

        public static CustomersObj getCustomersObj()
        Retrieves a copy of the customer object stored in this class. It's used as a placeholder to pre-load the customer object as a selection in the Appointment form. Also used in the CustomerController class when updating a customer.
        Returns:
        appointment object to be loaded in new scene

      • findCustomer

        public static void findCustomer​(int id)
        Finds the Contact object by the contact ID from the Customer Tableview on the home page.
        Parameters:
        id - is the ID number of the contact object.

      • deleteCustomer

        public static void deleteCustomer​(CustomersObj customer)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Uses a DELETE SQL call to delete selected object from the customers table in the MySQL database by customer ID. If rows are updated in the MySQL database then the current customerList ObservableList is cleared and an updated one is retrieved from the database.
        Parameters:
        customer - the selected customer object to be deleted
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - prevents crashes if incorrect SQL syntax is used
